messages.title: Believe in Britain
messages.content: Our four point plan for Britain

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An additional £3 billion per year for front line services and scrap Labour’s privatisation of our hospitals.
Introduce a fair, Australian-style, points based system, so we decide who works and stays here.
UKIP will scrap tax on the minimum wage, scrap the unfair bedroom tax and scrap the tax on your children when you die.
Spend here not abroad, cut foreign aid by 80% and invest in UK jobs and apprenticeships. Scrap tuition fees for STEM subjects.

issues.economy: Spend here not abroad, cut foreign aid by 80% and invest in UK jobs and apprenticeships.
issues.education: Scrap tuition fees for STEM subjects.
issues.health: Protect the NHS with an additional £3 billion per year for front services and scrap Labour’s privatisation of our hospitals.
issues.immigration: Control our borders by introducing a fair, Australian-style, points based system.

images.caption: Fiona Mills' portrait and campaign message
